Hi,

I'm writing my masterthesis about an implementation of JAX-RS / JSR311=

on top of Restlet, and also collected opinions about JAX-RS. I've read
a l=
ot of messages in the archive about opinions to JAX-RS from the
middle of f=
ebruary 2007. Now I'm interested what you are thinking now.
Do you think yo=
ur objections are considered? Which ones not?
And especially I am intereste=
d, what Roy Fielding thinks now.

Who is interested to have a look in the p=
re-alpha version, could take
a look at
http://wiki.restlet.org/docs_1.1/g1/=
13-restlet/28-restlet/57-restlet.html
.

best regards
   Stephan Koops
